title: TEOF Systemic Metadata
description: Minimal metadata required to express systemic alignment targets and layers.

schema_version.description: Optional semantic version for the metadata schema.

systemic_targets.description: Sorted list of systemic axes advanced by this artifact (S1–S10).

layer_targets.description: Ordered list of governance layers touched (L0–L6). Primary layer should appear first.

systemic_scale.description: Highest systemic axis (1–10) that must be satisfied before deployment.

summary.description: Optional human-readable summary or objective line.

receipts.description: Optional list of receipt URIs associated with the artifact.

references.description: Optional list of related plan IDs or governance artifacts.

created_at.description: ISO-8601 timestamp when the metadata was generated.

updated_at.description: ISO-8601 timestamp when the metadata was last updated.
